me.description: Allow a user to retrieve their account information.

get_users_permissions.description: Get a list of all a users permissions.

all_users.description: Allow user to retrieve a list of all users.

find_user_by_email.description: Allow user to retrieve any user by their email.

update_email.description: Allow a user to update any users email.

add_whitelist_to_user.description: Allow a user to add a whitelist to any user.

delete_whitelist_from_user.description: Allow a user to delete a whitelist from any user.

add_blacklist_to_user.description: Allow a user to add a blacklist to any user.

delete_blacklist_from_user.description: Allows a user to delete a blacklist from any user.

add_role_to_user.description: Allow a user to add a role to any user.

update_users_active_status.description: Allows a user to update any users active status.
